issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Fix typo in RequestHedgingProxyProvider and RequestHedgingRMFailoverProxyProvider

Thank you [~gabor.bota] for providing the patch! Would you fix a typo in RequestHedgingRMFailoverProxyProvider.java as well?
Yes, sure. Is there a ticket for it?
This issue is the ticket. Would you include the fix into the patch to fix the typo in this issue?
You are right, missed it, I've searched for the string and no other result came up just the RequestHedgingProxyProvider. I've submitted the new patch which fixes both.
